name: Cold Steel Javelin
description: The Cold Steel Javelin is a variant of the Cold Steel Spear that can only be thrown. Deals frost damage on hit and has a 15% chance to apply a unique debuff to targets while dealing periodic frost damage. Excels when used against Fauna that have a weakness to frost.
